hidden_abilites: Quickly moves (dashes) to first target and quickly engages in battle.
Upon first appearing, heals 10% of all ally unit HP, and casts magic barrier for a period of time.
Becomes immune to stun, restores more HP during regular attacks, and when HP falls under 30%, becomes immune to knockback.
description.skill2: Increase HP of undead unit in Guild War (3%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Hands Of Death ]
